name: Caesar Park Buenos Aires Managed By Mgallery

reviews.title: Wonderful property - Great location
reviews.text: This is the second time I have stayed here. The gardens are beautiful. The property is exquisite and well maintained. The food is good. Staff are friendly and helpful and the neighborhood is a great place to walk, shop and eat!

reviews.title: Exceptional stay!
reviews.text: A beautiful hotel in a wonderful location, the staff was friendly and helpful. The room was very comfy. The bathroom Devine! It is in a very upscale part of town with all the designer shopping. Our breakfast was included and quite delicious!

reviews.title: Great Location - Fine Hotel
reviews.text: As downtown Buenos Aires continues to literally decay under Government mismanagement, it is refreshing to install oneself in the elegant Recoleta district, and the Caesar Park is beautifully situated for that purpose. An easy walk to a range of sidewalk cafes overlooking the parks, to the Museum of Fine Arts, to the fine shops on Alvear or, for the more practical spenders, to the Recoleta Village shopping centre.

reviews.title: Excellent hotel and great location
reviews.text: The Hotel's public rooms are spacious and welcoming, with an excellent breakfast buffet invitingly spread over three tables. Dinner there one night was excellent. Our only little compaint: the temperature in the bar is kept so low that we had to enjoy our cocktails in the adjacent tearoom.

reviews.title: Excellent location and nice hotel but a bit dated
reviews.text: Our guest room was well-furnished, quiet, clean and with ample space to store all the clothes liberated from our suitcases.

Stayed 2 nights on the way to Antarctica. Very well located near things to do and shopping. Friendly and efficient service. Breakfasts were good. Bathroom was very nice. There were even nice salts to use in the bathtub. The bed was very comfortable, and I had a partial view of the water and surrounding area. It's true that some things in the room and hotel are nearing needing updating and that the wifi is overpriced, but I'd stay again.
reviews.title: Good Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located in Recoleta, an area of Buenos Aires which is lovely, and seemed very safe for folks, especially tourists, to wander around. The staff was wonderful and accommodating, especially the Concierge desk team. They gave us great tips on where to find the best Italian Gelato (at café Arkakao), tasty Empanadas, and the best Steak restaurants, and all were within easy walking distance from the hotel!
reviews.title: Location, location, location 1st rate

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The lobby of the hotel is spacious and just beautiful. The rooms were a good size and well appointed. The bathroom was all marble and the toiletries were just great. Wi-Fi was included (no additional fee) and very appreciated.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel’s location is across the street from an upscale indoor mall. You can use the ATMs there to obtain local currency, at a reasonable rate. There are many small sidewalk cafes and restaurants very near the hotel. Especially near are several steak houses and Italian restaurants (walk out the hotel’s front doors, turn right and walk approximately 500 yards). Breakfast was included in our package. It had everything we look for in a good buffet. Eggs, breakfast meats, pancakes and french toast, cereals, fresh fruits, juices, etc. The best part was the coffee. I enjoyed the café latte very much. The cappuccino was great, too. My only disappointment during our stay is that we bought stamps from the Concierge desk for our postcards and the concierge on duty told us she would post them for us, that day. It’s been 4-weeks and counting, so we don’t think those cards will surface. It may be that the postal service in Argentina is just slow but…
reviews.title: It is Fine but Needs Attention
Good option
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our 3 night stay and will no doubt be back to this amazing city and great hotel.

My daughter and I just completed a stay of a week in this hotel and we were very pleased with it. The location of the hotel is excellent - very safe and also very close to many of the tourist attractions. We walked everywhere from there. The staff are very helpful (particularly the concierges) and very friendly.
reviews.title: excellent hotel

reviews.text: The bathrooms are a little quirky - single basin and poor water pressure in bath, but this is being very picky. We complained about the shower pressure and flooding and this was rectified immediately. Rooms are clean and reasonably spacious.
reviews.title: Good location and good service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Irritatingly wifi is not included in the price and also very difficult to connect to - always involving a call to hotel staff for assistance as passwords didn't work. Also no free water or tea or coffee
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel

reviews.text: This is a very well located hotel in Recoleta, since just opposite the hotel there is a small Shopping Mall (Patio Bullrich) where you can have Starbucks coffee and also buy some excellent local wines as they have a wine shop there. They also had a Money Exchange counter in the basement and even a movie theather.
reviews.title: Best hotel in Recoleta.

reviews.text: The hotel itself is good, rooms are comfortable, although there is no free water, coffee or tea. The same applies for the wifi as it is charged, except you may have it included in your room rate. Breakfast has a very good selection, especially fruits and pastries. Not far from the Hotel you have many restaurants together in a place called La Recova and if you are looking for a good supermarket (Disco) it is just a few blocks from the Hotel (Av. Quintana near Av. Callao).
reviews.title: Elegant and Well Located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent a long weekend in a Junior Suite at this hotel. Located in one of the most elegant and traditional residential areas of the city, it's just crossing the street from the lovely Patio Bulrich and a block away from the small restaurant place ofvLa Recova.
reviews.title: Into Buenos Aires for the Pellegrini Stake GI

reviews.text: The hotel is modernly and elegantly decorated, with a good reception service; outstanding attention from the Limo Concierge -always had a car available at your disposal- and a good bar (although a better "wines-by-the-glass" list could make it better). Rooms with plenty of natural sunlight and space are quiet and nicely decorated (great pillows), and benefit for an excelent room service.
reviews.title: Beautiful property with warm and caring staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good value hotel, not sophisticated but extremely well located.
reviews.title: A good option in Buenos Aires

reviews.text: This hotel is now one of my favorites. The location is great in Recoleta/Retiro, right across the street from the Patio Bullrich Shopping Center. Staff was always helpful, hotel public areas were top notch and the beds and bedding were oh so comfy. Select a room overlooking the garden for a quiet experience. Just got back yesterday and miss it already.
reviews.title: Good Location and good hotel but there are better to be found

reviews.text: I would recommend they give free wifi in the rooms and also supply free coffee supplies in rooms, otherwise there are no negatives I can think of.
reviews.title: Long way away

description: Caesar Park Buenos Aires is located in the heart of the elegant Recoleta district. Located a few steps from the Fine Art Museum, the Opera House, the Recoleta Cementery and the main tourist attractions the hotel surrounded by fine restaurants, traditional cafes, art galleries and boutiques. The Patio Bullrich -Deluxe Shopping Mall- is across the street.Beautiful Rio de la Plata views and lovely quiet sights of the secret garden can be appreciated from guest rooms.For pleasure and relax the hotel offers a full Fitness Center, indoor heated pool, solarium, sauna and relax room.
